description: Get the little ones eating their greens with this quick and easy recipe. Kid-friendly and nutritious, it's the best kind of breakfast!
keywords: Eggs on toast,Pescatarian,Sep 2020,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg,Healthier Easier,Spring,Peanut free
name: Eggs & Smashed Peas On Toast Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a saucepan of water to the boil over high heat. Add peas. Cook for 1 minute or until bright green. Strain.
Transfer peas to a bowl and mash with a fork. Add ricotta, mashing well to combine. Season with black pepper. To serve, spread pea mixture on toast and top with egg.
